page.title: 16HOUSING.
page.content: Silkstone: Our house is in Manor Park.It is a new red brick council house which has been built for about 6 months.As you go through the front door you are in the entrance hall.There are 3 doors leading off and a flight of stairs. Straight forward is the downstairs toilet.The door on the left is the lounge.Straight opposite is the dining room. Next is the kitchen where the back door is and there is a pantry. Up the stairs are 3 bedrooms a bathroom and a cupboard.On the left is the bathroom and the second largest bedroom occupied by my mum and dad.On the right are two bedrooms mine and my sisters.
